name: SparseOpaquePreconditioner_Double
desc: A structure that represents a double-precision preconditioner.

items.name: init(type: SparsePreconditioner_t, mem: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, apply: (UnsafeMutableRawPointer, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE, DenseMatrix_Double, DenseMatrix_Double) -> Void)
var apply: (UnsafeMutableRawPointer, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE, DenseMatrix_Double, DenseMatrix_Double) -> Void
items.desc: A function that calculates Y = PX, where P is the preconditioner.

items.name: var mem: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: The unaltered memory pointer that passes as the first parameter of the apply function.
